item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

not sure.
try this instead

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(100);
usingSpecial = true;
}

[/code]

item.title: Spec code
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

Can somone tell wich number is fore what.
I know that the 8002 is the item id.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(20) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); dclaws = 3; }
